root.name: Knights of the Temple: Infernal Crusade
root.description: StoryIn this you take control of Paul a newly knighted young Temple Knight that has been sent on a mission to uncover an evil conspirisy. An evil bishop has kidnapped Adelle, a mystical young woman whit divine powers and whit her "help" he performs dark rituals in Holy places to desecrate them and gain acces to the Gates of Hell. Features The game has 25 levels in 7 different settings. 30 different types of enemys whit different weaknesses and behaviers. Motion Captured animations. Character development through compinationattacks, Specialattacks and Divine powers. Destructable enviroments. A 27 track Soundtrack by Wíthin Temptation
